text: There's really no point in having children if you're not going to be home enough to father them.
author: Anthony Edwards

text: Having children is like having a bowling alley installed in your brain.
author: Martin Mull

text: The well-being and welfare of children should always be our focus.
author: Todd Tiahrt

text: I had no idea that mothering my own child would be so healing to my own sadness from my childhood.
author: Susie Bright

text: To me luxury is to be at home with my daughter, and the occasional massage doesn't hurt.
author: Olivia Newton-John
